channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why The Boeing 787 Doesn't Have Winglets

item.title: Disaster registry may offer false sense of security, disability advocates warn

item.title: 7/13/2025: Healing Justice; Lowriders of New Mexico
item.description: First, a report on exonerees and survivors coming together to heal. And, a look at why lowrider cars are celebrated as a cultural symbol.

item.title: A Bond Broken: The toll of domestic violence on children
item.description: The children left behind and the hidden toll of domestic violence in Chicago.

item.title: Russia launches 136 drones into Ukraine ahead of expected Trump announcement
item.description: Russia launched four missiles and 136 drones into Ukraine overnight into Monday morning, according to Ukraine's air force.

item.title: China's exports jump 5.8% in June as tariffs reprieve prompts a rush of orders
item.description: China has reported its exports accelerated in June as a reprieve on U.S. tariffs prompted a rush of orders by companies and consumers

item.title: Armies of Texas volunteers dig out, clean up, after fatal floods
Texas flooding live updates: Search continues for missing with 130 confirmed deaths
item.description: More than 130 people are dead after devastating flooding in the Texas Hill Country that began early on the Fourth of July.

item.title: Search for Texas flood victims to resume after pause due to heavy rains
item.description: Search crews are expecting to resume looking for flood victims in Texas after more heavy rains temporarily paused their efforts.
